title: The best bad idea for smartphones
description: Samsung DeX turns your phone into an app on your desktop, but it wasn't the first to try making your phone into a laptop. In this episode of Processor, Dieter Bohn looks at the history of weird phone laptop gadgets, from the Palm Foleo to the Motorola Atrix Lapdock.
